title: tcalc
description: Resample a 4D phantom for theoretical calculations

input_image.title: Input Image
input_image.description: Input image (4D phantom for theoretical calculations)

echo_time.title: Echo Time
echo_time.description: Echo Time (TE) in seconds [e.g., T1-weighted images for 3T TE=0.01 s]

repetition_time.title: Repetition Time
repetition_time.description: Repetition Time (TR) in seconds [e.g., T1-weighted images for 3T TR=0.7 s]

num_voxel_x.title: Number of Voxels along X
num_voxel_x.description: Number of Voxels along X (default: phantom)

num_voxel_y.title: Number of Voxels along Y
num_voxel_y.description: Number of Voxels along Y (default: phantom)

num_voxel_z.title: Number of Voxels along Z
num_voxel_z.description: Number of Voxels along Z (default: phantom)

voxel_size_x.title: Size of voxels along X
voxel_size_x.description: Size of voxels along X (default: phantom)

voxel_size_y.title: Size of voxels along Y
voxel_size_y.description: Size of voxels along Y (default: phantom)

voxel_size_z.title: Size of voxels along Z
voxel_size_z.description: Size of voxels along Z i.e., number of slices (default: phantom)

start_position.title: Start Position
start_position.description: Starting position of the volume in mm (default = 0mm)

noise_sigma.title: Noise Sigma
noise_sigma.description: Add noise with given sigma (default: 0 i.e., no noise)
